ticket.title: [PATCH] ActionController::MimeResponds depends on ActionController::Rendering
ticket.original-body:
In `retrieve_response_from_mimes` (line 262), `ActionController::MimeResponds` uses `lookup_context` which is defined in `AbstractController::ViewPaths`, which is made available by `ActionController::Rendering`.
According to the online documentation, each metal module should automatically include its own dependencies. That said, the following class doesn't work as expected.
@@@ ruby class MyController < ActionController::Metal abstract!
include ActionController::MimeResponds end @@@
